sentences.sContent: The style will be critical in the delivery of epideictic speech, style is your word preference and syntax.
sentences.sContent_eng: The style will be critical in the delivery of epideictic speech, style is your word preference and syntax.
sentences.sCn: 在做词藻华丽的演讲时，风格至关重要，它体现在你的用词偏好和句法上。

synos.tran: 富于词藻的；（文体、演讲等）意在表现词藻技巧的；夸耀的

trans.tranCn: (文体、演讲等)意在表现词藻技巧的富于词藻的
